The following post is very lame, but I'm half asleep. The title is
probably in horribly bad spanish, but I'll use the same exuse as my
previous for that.

::The Lavatrons/Havoc/Repressor::

Astral, Griplash, Recklessa, and Starlight detour a bit while heading
toward the Iron Fist.

"Well, team, I think its time to leave," Astral turns around and says.
The others nod their approval.

"Where do you want to go?" Griplash asks Astral, heading off toward a
volcano with him. The volcano suddenly blows its top, and before they
know it, the Lavacons are buried under tons of ashes and lava, perhaps
to be reawakened some other day.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc looks down at his wrist as a small device beeps, his eyes
widening.

"Warmachines, our ride home has arrived," he says over his comm, "Lets
get out of here."

He walks out of the Iron Fist, transforming into vehicle mode and
flying off toward the ship that had just gotten to earth to take the
Warmachines back, Repressor following him.
